Stixbox Function

NOM

    lsfit - Fit a multiple regression normal model

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

[b, Ib, e, s, Is] = lsfit(y,x,C);

PARAMETRES

    • y : dependant variate (column vector)
    • x : regressor variates
    • C : confidence level for the confidence intervals (default0.95).
    • b : vector of point estimates,
    • Ib : confidence intervals,
    • s : estimated standard deviation of error with confidence interval Is,
    • e : residuals.

DESCRIPTION

    Fit a multiple regression normal model. An intercept not included in x is automatically added as an extra column.

VOIR AUSSI

    linreg lsselect
